comment.author: 25512944@N06
comment._content: In modern terms, looking north(ish) from the corner of Gibson's Road and Princes Highway, Figtree, Wollongong. The tree, after which the suburb was named, was cut down in the 1980s due to disease.

comment.author: 25512944@N06
comment._content: That marker appears pretty close to the photographer's location given the lowish resolution of the satellite picture. The figtree was on the southern bank of Allan's Creek, on the eastern side of the roadway
